entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023
